snippet: A public relations campaign from the Private Equity Growth Capital Council seeks to counteract the image problems the industry has faced during the election year cycle. The latest installment points to the industry's ties to pension funds, university...
abstract: A public relations campaign from the Private Equity Growth Capital Council seeks to counteract the image problems the industry has faced during the election year cycle. The latest installment points to the industry's ties to pension funds, university endowments and charities.

headline.main: Private Equity Group Aims to Relate to Average Americans
